title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 331.10 - Examination procedure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 331.10 - Examination procedure

State Regulations

When an examination is performed under subdivision (4) of
section
13-m
of the Workers' Compensation Law, it shall be by a qualified psychologist at a
place reasonably convenient to the claimant and in the presence of the
claimant's psychologist or physician, if in the attending psychologist's or
physician's opinion his or her presence is necessary. A duplicate copy of all
notices of request for such examinations shall be sent to the attending
psychologist or physician. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
331.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
